categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The trunk-thing was an alien. In 4 BBY, it took part in a game of sabacc with the gambler Lando Calrissian, Administrator Senior of the Oseon system Lob Doluff, and several other beings.

This alien played sabacc with the gambler Lando Calrissian, Administrator Senior of the Oseon system Lob Doluff, and several others in 4 BBY at Doluff's home on Oseon 6845. When it learned from Calrissian that the Sharu had regained control over the Rafa system, it unhappily asked whether they would continue selling life-crystal, expensive objects which granted the wearer a lengthened life.

The creature struggled to pronounced "r's" and "l's". It had blue eyes, green blood, a small trunk beneath its eyes, and a name that was unpronounceable by Humans. Lando Calrissian, who was unaware of what species the creature was, found it strange-looking.
This character makes a very brief appearance in the novel Lando Calrissian and the Flamewind of Oseon. Its species and gender are unidentified.
